StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCandidateProgramCriteriaWaiver]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@CandidateWaiverID int)
AS
IF @CandidateWaiverID = -1 SELECT DISTINCT NULL AS CANDIDATE_WAIVER_ID ,'N' AS Checked ,w.[WAIVER_ID] ,w.[EFFECTIVE_DATE] ,wc.[WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID] ,wc.[WAIVER_CATEGORY_CODE] ,wc.[WAIVER_CATEGORY_DESC] ,wt.[WAIVER_TYPE_ID] ,wt.[WAIVER_TYPE_CODE] ,wt.[WAIVER_TYPE_DESC] ,wl.[WAIVER_LEVEL_ID] ,wl.[WAIVER_LEVEL_CODE] ,wl.[WAIVER_LEVEL_DESC] FROM [dbo].[WAIVER] w WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [dbo].[WAIVER_CATEGORY] wc ON w.WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID = wc.WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID AND wc.WAIVER_CATEGORY_CODE IN ('D', 'F') INNER JOIN [dbo].[WAIVER_TYPE] wt ON w.WAIVER_TYPE_ID = wt.WAIVER_TYPE_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[WAIVER_LEVEL] wl ON w.WAIVER_LEVEL_ID = wl.WAIVER_LEVEL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[CANDIDATE_PROGRAM_CRITERIA_WAIVER] pcw ON pcw.WAIVER_ID = w.WAIVER_ID ELSE SELECT @CandidateWaiverID AS CANDIDATE_WAIVER_ID ,CASE WHEN pcw.[CANDIDATE_WAIVER_ID] IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS Checked ,w.[WAIVER_ID] ,w.[EFFECTIVE_DATE] ,wc.[WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID] ,wc.[WAIVER_CATEGORY_CODE] ,wc.[WAIVER_CATEGORY_DESC] ,wt.[WAIVER_TYPE_ID] ,wt.[WAIVER_TYPE_CODE] ,wt.[WAIVER_TYPE_DESC] ,wl.[WAIVER_LEVEL_ID] ,wl.[WAIVER_LEVEL_CODE] ,wl.[WAIVER_LEVEL_DESC] FROM [dbo].[WAIVER] w WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [dbo].[WAIVER_CATEGORY] wc ON w.WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID = wc.WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID AND wc.WAIVER_CATEGORY_CODE IN ('D', 'F') INNER JOIN [dbo].[WAIVER_TYPE] wt ON w.WAIVER_TYPE_ID = wt.WAIVER_TYPE_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[WAIVER_LEVEL] wl ON w.WAIVER_LEVEL_ID = wl.WAIVER_LEVEL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[CANDIDATE_PROGRAM_CRITERIA_WAIVER] pcw ON pcw.CANDIDATE_WAIVER_ID = @CandidateWaiverID AND pcw.WAIVER_ID = w.WAIVER_ID
